channel.title: Adding Npc Vs. Player combat
channel.description: I am currently on a 614 that I am trying to add Npc Vs. Player combat so people will have to train to level up. I have a code already in the source that tells me how to add the combat but says i need to find skills.combat which i can't if anyone knows what file to add this in it will help alot
